trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> event is raised for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that is visible on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

To improve performance, set the properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs> to change the appearance of the cell instead of directly accessing a cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
If you manually paint the cell, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
If you do not set <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`, the cell will paint over your customizations.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the cell to be painted.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
The column index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
An error message that is associated with the cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
dataGridView is `null`.
-or-
graphics is `null`.
-or-
cellStyle is `null`.
paintParts is not a valid bitwise combination of values.
Gets the border style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.

Change the borders of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.AdvancedBorderStyle%2A> property to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Gets the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Change the appearance of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Gets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.

For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window, and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the small area that was covered.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
Gets the column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property returns -1 when a row header cell is being painted.
The column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.

When the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is a row header cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

When the current cell is a data cell, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Gets the formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A> property contains the value of the cell after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has been applied to it, and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event has been handled.
The formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Paints the specified parts of the cell for the area in the specified bounds.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.

<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex"></xref> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
-or-

<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex"></xref> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
Paints the cell background for the area in the specified bounds.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.

`true` to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle"></xref>; `false` to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle"></xref>.

<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex"></xref> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
-or-

<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex"></xref> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
Paints the cell content for the area in the specified bounds.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.

<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex"></xref> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
-or-

<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex"></xref> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
The cell parts that are to be painted.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to be painted.
Gets the row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property returns -1 when a column header is being painted.
The row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
Gets the value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.Value%2A> property contains the value of the cell before any formatting occurs.
The value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
